sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' export default function TableForm({description, setDescription , rate , setRate,quantity, setQuantity, amount ,setAmount,file, setFile,handleChange}) { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } useEffect( ()=> { const calculateAmount = (amount) => { setAmount (quantity * rate) } calculateAmount(amount) }, [amount, rate, quantity, setAmount]) return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setRate(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />

{amount}

) }
